linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 10
  • Processor: Intel or AMD
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1050
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 11
  • Processor: Intel or AMD
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1050
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10
  • Processor: 2007 or later
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 11
  • Processor: 2007 or later
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: There's No Dinosaurs Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

supported_languages:
English*, Japanese*, Korean*, Polish*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
